title: direktX bugsplat error
body: error starting game then leaverbuster gave me 5 20 min ban games. please remove them since its not my faulth i couldnt join the game all out of sudden

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we're unable to remove any penalties associated with the Leaverbuster System, in order to prevent any sort of abuse of the system. Bugsplats are an indication that there's an issue with either your system drivers or your hardware, so I'd recommend working through our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to address the most common solutions.

Let me know if this resolved the issue or not.
